name: Randolph-Sheppard – Financial Relief and Restoration Payments
objective: To provide financial relief and restoration payments to offset losses to blind vendors that occurred as a result of the global pandemic during calendar year 2020, if those losses were not otherwise compensated, and to support State Business Enterprise Programs by allowing any remaining funds to be used for the purposes set forth in 34 C.F.R. 395.9.

authorizations.text: Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2021, Division H, Title 111, 318, and Randolph -Sheppard Act (20 U.S.C. 107f).

rules_regulations: Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2021, Division H, Title III, Section 318; and Randolph-Sheppard Act (20 U.S.C. 107f).
